resources.string: We could not acquire root access on your device.\n\nMost of this app\'s functions can be performed without root access. However, you won\'t be able to automatically restart SystemUI, which means you\'ll have to manually reboot the device instead.
File not found or root denied
For this action to take effect it is required to restart %1$s. Press OK to restart now.\n\nNote that if you\'re not rooted, this won\'t work and you\'ll have to manually reboot the device.
No backup found on this device
Would you like to create new backup now?

You have chosen to restore data from previous Rom Control preferences.

Please note! This operation will change your device settings based on the settings stored in this file.

DO NOT PROCEED unless absolutely sure!!!

Rom Control will close to allow data restoration and reopen again upon its completion. Depending on the amount of your settings this may take some time.

Please click "CONFIRM" to proceed or "CANCEL" to quit.
Backup completed successfully. The backup file can be found at\n%1$s
"Are you sure you want to run %1$s?"
For this action to take effect, full device reboot is required. Would you like to reboot now?
Your device will reboot IMMEDIATELY upon script completion!!!
This action will restore the following items to stock colors
Only hours and minutes are shown in clock.
"Seconds is shown in clock as well. Might be buggy in some locales when used with 24-hour format clock."
Show operator logo in status bar
"Operator logo is not shown in status bar. (Needs SystemUI restart)"
"Operator logo is shown in left side of status bar. (Needs SystemUI restart)"
Show data usage in quicksettings panel
"Data usage is not shown in quicksettings panel. (Needs SystemUI restart)"
"Data usage is shown at the bottom of quicksettings panel. (Needs SystemUI restart)"
Only default options are shown in power menu.
Options to reboot into recovery and download mode are shown in power menu.
Device won\'t respond to fingerprint when screen is off.

When screen is off, device can be directly unlocked when a right fingerprint is recognized. Note that screen lock type must be set to fingerprint, and due to a known bug, unless connected to the charger, this feature will only work for 5–10 minutes after the screen goes off.
Fingerprint is not allowed for the first unlock after reboot.
Fingerprint is allowed for the first unlock after reboot. A message rejecting fingerprint will still be shown though, which can be ignored.
Make virtual home button work on AOD
Home button on AOD won\'t work unless you double tap on the clock.
Status bar side margin (S7 default: 0, S8 default: 16)
